Unitron:




"Oh, I am so SORRY, MIGHTY Megatron, how dare I defy your GREATNESS.  You're 
not Galvatorn, you're more like Rodimus Prime!" he yelled as a blast scraped 
the bottom of his left foot and he began to fall with an expression of pain 
on his face.

But halfway towards the ground he transformed to his space fighter mode.  
"It'll be you who dies, impostor." he said, a missile launching from his left 
wing down at Megatron.
